full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA BDAG SNYING 'GRAMS KYI CHO GA BAR CHAD KUN LAS BZLOG PA CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(^SA BDAG SNYING 'GRAMS CHO GA NI, ,MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG NAG PA YI LUGS, ,STON PA BSOD NAMS RDO RJE YI, ,PHYAG LEN 'DI NI LHAS STON PA, ,DKON MCHOG BZANG POS GNANG BA'O, ,BLA MA MKHYEN RAB NGAG DBANG GI ,BZHED SROL DPE LAS BKOD PA LA, ,THOG MTHAR SPYOR RGYU'I YAN LAG NI, ,DAM PA GONG MA'I GSUNG LAS BTUS, KHA BSKONG LTAR BYAS BSGRIGS PA NI, ,BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG RDO RJE YIS, ,'DI BRIS DGE BAS RGYAL BSTAN DAR, ,'GRO BA KUN LA BDE SKYID LDAN, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR RGYAS GYUR CIG ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DAG ZHING DU SKYES GYUR CIG ,DGE'O,, ,,)
